summary.para: Creates a path geometry object representing the path data.

param.name: fillMode
param.para: Fill mode for the path geometry object.

param.name: pathGeometry
param.para: On completion, pathGeometry will contain a point to the created object.

returns.para: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

summary.para: Gets commands from the commands array.

param.name: commandsCount
param.para: The element count of the buffer.

param.name: startIndex
param.para: The index of the first commands to retrieve.

returns.para: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

summary.para: Gets the size of the commands array.

returns.para: Returns the size of the commands array.

summary.para: Gets data from the segment data array.

param.name: data
param.para: Buffer to contain the segment data array.

param.name: dataCount
param.para: The element count of the buffer.

param.name: startIndex
param.para: The index of the first segment data to retrieve.

returns.para: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

summary.para: Gets the size of the segment data array.

returns.para: Returns the size of the segment data array.

summary.para: Removes commands from the end of the commands array.

param.name: commandsCount
param.para: Specifies how many commands to remove.

returns.para: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

summary.para: Removes data from the end of the segment data array.

param.name: dataCount
param.para: Specifies how much data to remove.

returns.para: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

summary.para: Updates the commands array. Existing commands not updated by this method are preserved. The array is resized larger if necessary to accommodate the new commands.

param.name: commandsCount
param.para: The number of commands to update.

param.name: startIndex
param.para: The index at which to begin updating commands. Must be less than or equal to the size of the commands array.

returns.para: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

summary.para: Updates the segment data array. Existing segment data not updated by this method are preserved. The array is resized larger if necessary to accommodate the new segment data.

param.name: dataCount
param.para: The number of data to update.

param.name: startIndex
param.para: The index at which to begin updating segment data. Must be less than or equal to the size of the segment data array.

returns.para: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

summary.para: Interface describing SVG path data. Path data can be set as the 'd' attribute on a 'path' element.

The path data set is factored into two arrays. The segment data array stores all numbers and the commands array stores the set of commands. Unlike the string data set in the d attribute, each command in this representation uses a fixed number of elements in the segment data array. Therefore, the path 'M 0,0 100,0 0,100 Z' is represented as: 'M0,0 L100,0 L0,100 Z'. This is split into two arrays, with the segment data containing '0,0 100,0 0,100', and the commands containing 'M L L Z'.
